content: आवर्तः {@--1@} Turning round, winding, revolving; प्रदक्षिणावर्तशिखः <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--2@} A whirlpool, an eddy, whirl; नृपं तमावर्तमनोज्ञनाभिः <ls>R. 6. 52</ls>; दर्शितावर्तनाभेः <ls>Me. 28</ls>; <ls>Dk. 2</ls>; आवर्तः संशयानां <ls>Pt. 1. 191.</ls> {@--3@} Deliberation, revolving (in the mind), anxiety. {@--4@} A lock of hair curling backwards, especially on a horse. {@--5@} The two depressions of the forehead above the eye-brows. {@--6@} A crowded place (where many men live closely together). {@--7@} A kind of jewel. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of a form of cloud personified; आवर्तो निर्जलो मेघः. {@--9@} Melting (of metals). {@--10@} Doubt. {@--11@} Worldly existence (संसार). --र्तं A mineral substance, pyrites (माक्षिकधातु).
